jobDescription: Company: Boston Applied Technologies Incorporated (BATi), Woburn, MA, is a fast growing technology company with great potential. BATi offers exciting career growth and great benefits. The Company is actively searching for highly motivated individuals. For consideration, Send resume, salary requirement and references to Human Resources via fax (781-935-2860) or email (hr@bostonati.com). No phone call please. Work permit is needed.  Boston Applied Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Job description: Applicant will clean, inspect, and assemble/contact precision fiber optic components and devices, using hand tools and microscope. Verify accuracy of finished products. Qualification: · Quality conscious and pays attention to details  · Good hand/eye coordination  · Ability to work safely on fragile, high value small optical parts  · Accurately assemble the sub components and perform visual inspection.  · Ability to effectively communicate one on one and in small groups to operators, management and engineers  · Positive attitude with a dependable attendance history  · Can work under deadlines  · Ability to respond quickly and efficiently while multitasking  · Maintain safe operations by adhering to safety procedures and regulations  · Previous experience with assemblies using microscope is a plus
